bill.summary: 6/29/1993--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Defense to carry out a program to demonstrate, for military and civilian use, electric motor vehicles and support systems in one or more geographically dispersed metropolitan areas. Allows financial assistance from the Secretary under the program for up to four years. Outlines provisions concerning program application and selection procedures. Authorizes appropriations.
